puppeteer Launch Headless.description: Creates a Chromium instance with headless egal false

Wait For Target.description: Waits until a predicat, this searches for a target in all browser contexts

Page$.description: The method runs document.querySelector within the page.

Page$$.description: The method runs document.querySelectorAll within the page.

Page.$eval.description: This method runs Array.from(document.querySelector(selector)) within the page and passes it as the first argument

Page.$$eval.description: This method runs Array.from(document.querySelectorAll(selector)) within the page and passes it as the first argument

Page Emulate.description: Emulates a given device metrics and user agent

Page Focus.description: Focuses an element within the page

Page Go Back.description: Navigates to the previous page in the history

Page Go Forward.description: Navigates to the next page in the history

Page Goto.description: Navigates the page to a URL

Page Keyboard Type.description: Types a text into a focused element

Page Pdf.description: Generates a PDF from the page

Page Screenshot.description: Generates a screenshot of the page

Page WaitFor.description: Waits until an element/predicate/timeout is resolved

Page Wait For Function.description: Waits until a predicate returns a truthy value

Page Wait For Navigation.description: Waits until the page navigates to a new URL or reloads

PageWaitForRequest.description: Waits until a request by URL/predicate is resolved

Page Wait For Response.description: Waits until a response by URL/predicate is resolved

Page Wait For Selector.description: Waits until an element (by selector) is appeared in the page

Page Wait For XPath.description: Waits until an element (by XPath) is appeared in the page

Event DocumentLoaded.description: Emitted when the DOM is parsed and ready (without waiting for resources)

Event Load.description: Emitted when the page is loaded

Event Console.description: Emitted when a script within the page uses `console`

Event Metrics.body: page.on('metrics', data => console.info(`ðŸ‘‰ Timestamp added at ${data.metrics.Timestamp}`))
Event Metrics.description: EEmitted when a script within the page uses `console.timeStamp`

Event Error.description: Emitted when the page emits an error event

body: const sleep = duration => new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, duration));

Examples Pdf Basic.description: Creates a basic example with generate pdf file

Examples Screenshot Basic.description: Creates a basic example with screenshot

Example Basic Firefox.description: Creates a basic example with firefox
